snippet: Point guard Jarvis Johnson, one of the Minnesota basketball team’s top incoming freshmen, was denied medical clearance to play.
abstract: Incoming University of Minnesota point guard Jarvis Johnson is denied medical clearance due to heart condition; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Point guard Jarvis Johnson, one of the Minnesota basketball team’s top incoming freshmen, was denied medical clearance to play.

headline.main: Setback for Incoming Freshman at Minnesota
